title: i recived honor level 3, but didn't get the loading screen of level 3

replies.body: If you get honored enough in your previous match then you'll have a special ribbon representing your honor. This only lasts for one match!
That's such a useless honor system LOL
what one match only? that is useless
mine was there for some games, then it dissapeared. the honor level flair should stay until you get to another honor level, only the 3 honor thing lasts for one game.

Thats the stupidiest shit ever LOL. So, let me get this straight..... You play many games of league playing hard to carry your team and riot gives you a way to represent your honor by displaying a badge on you loading screen, but only after you are honored your previous game.... Even though on your profile you ARE honor 5 it is not shown in loading screen unless you have been honored your previous game.... What the fuck is this non sense?
so whats the point if u cant flash ur honor lvl?
Crazy, its almost like the badge is incentive or something.
Yeah it's weird for me too. Sometimes it shows up but then other games it doesn't. idk what the issue is.
I had a theory, I gained honor by playing supports. and it usually shows up when I play supports. but top lane or ADC, not so much
